LanguageData.Mousekin_IdeoMeme_RodentDiversity.label: Rodentkind Diversity
LanguageData.Mousekin_IdeoMeme_RodentDiversity.descri: All rodentkind are equal throughout the land.
LanguageData.Mousekin_IdeoMeme_RodentPurity.label: Rodentkind Purity
LanguageData.Mousekin_IdeoMeme_RodentPurity.descripti: Mousekins are the chosen stewards of the land; all other rodent races are abominations.
